seo.title: Hostel Brikette FAQs - Positano
seo.description: Frequently asked questions about staying at Hostel Brikette in Positano: breakfast, check-in times, prices, location, amenities, and more.

intro: Quick answers to the most common questions about staying at Hostel Brikette in Positano.

sections.title: Facilities & Amenities
body: Hostel Brikette offers air-conditioned rooms and dorms, free Wi-Fi, a large terrace with sea views, an on-site bar serving breakfast and evening meals, and luggage storage. Each dorm bed has an individual locker (bring your own padlock or purchase one at reception).

images.alt: Terrace at Hostel Brikette overlooking Positano.
images.caption: The communal terrace is where most guests meet, eat, and plan day trips.

sections.title: Location & Access
body: The hostel is about 350 metres from the centre of Positano and 350 metres from the nearest beach. The Chiesa Nuova bus stop is less than 80 metres away with no stairs to the hostel.

sections.title: Check-in, Check-out & Age Policy
body: Regular check-in is from 15:00 to 22:30, and check-out is from 07:30 to 10:30. Check-in for dorm rooms is only possible for guests aged between 18 and 39 years. These restrictions do not apply to private rooms.

faqs.q: What kind of breakfast is served at Hostel Brikette?
a: Guests enjoy a highly-rated à la carte menu. Book direct for complimentary breakfast.

faqs.q: What are the check-in and check-out times at Hostel Brikette?
a: Regular check-in is from 15:00 to 22:30, and check-out is from 07:30 to 10:30.

faqs.q: How much does it cost to stay at Hostel Brikette?
a: Prices vary by date and room type. For up-to-date prices, search by room and date.

faqs.q: What is there to do at Hostel Brikette?
a: The hostel organises or recommends hiking; additional activities may incur charges.

faqs.q: How far is Hostel Brikette from the centre of Positano?
a: The property is about 350 metres from the centre of Positano.

faqs.q: How close to the beach is Hostel Brikette?
a: The nearest beach is roughly 350 metres away.

faqs.q: What room types are available at Hostel Brikette?
a: You can book mixed dormitory beds, female-only dormitory beds, or private double rooms with ensuite.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette have a terrace with sea views?
a: Yes — a large shared terrace overlooks Positano, offering panoramic sea views.

faqs.q: Is free Wi-Fi provided?
a: Yes — complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

faqs.q: Is breakfast included in the rate?
a: Breakfast is included in the rate if you book directly; otherwise it is charged additionally.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette have an on-site bar?
a: Yes — the bar serves coffee, light snacks, breakfast, evening meals, and drinks between 07:30 and 23:30 each day.

faqs.q: Can I store my luggage before check-in or after check-out?
a: Yes — luggage storage is available from 10:30 for guests checking in, and from 07:30 to 15:30 for those checking out.

faqs.q: Are there age restrictions at Hostel Brikette?
a: Check-in for dorm rooms is only possible for guests aged between 18 and 39 years. These restrictions do not apply to private rooms.

faqs.q: Are children allowed?
a: Dorm rooms are adults-only and cannot accommodate children. Book private rooms to overcome age restrictions.

faqs.q: Are pets allowed?
a: Sorry, pets are not permitted on the premises.

faqs.q: Does the hostel have its own parking?
a: The hostel does not have on-site parking; public parking garages are available in Positano for a fee.

faqs.q: Is air-conditioning available?
a: Yes — all rooms and dorms are air-conditioned.

faqs.q: Are lockers provided in the dormitories?
a: Yes — each bed has an individual locker; bring your own padlock or purchase one at reception.

faqs.q: Are towels included?
a: A shower towel is provided at check-in. Beach towels are available to rent.

faqs.q: Is bed linen included?
a: Yes — fresh linen is provided on check in.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette have laundry facilities?
a: The hostel does not have laundry facilities; however, there are some close by.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette have quiet hours?
a: Quiet hours are observed from 23:30 to 07:30.

faqs.q: How do I get to Hostel Brikette from Naples Airport?
a: Take the Curreri shuttle to Sorrento, then the SITA bus to Positano; get off at Chiesa Nuova bus stop.

faqs.q: Where is the nearest bus stop?
a: The Chiesa Nuova bus stop is less than 80 m (250 ft) away with no stairs to the hostel.

faqs.q: What payment methods are accepted?
a: Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, ATM card, and cash are accepted at reception.

faqs.q: Is reception open 24 hours?
a: Reception opens at 07:30 and closes at 22:30. Late arrivals must be arranged in advance.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette have a shared kitchen?
a: No communal kitchen is available, but guests have access to a fridge, kettle, and microwave.

faqs.q: Does Hostel Brikette offer female-only dorms?
a: Yes — female-only dorm beds can be booked.

faqs.q: Is the property wheelchair accessible?
a: The hostel is not wheelchair accessible.
